rules.name: controllo_range_time
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 or 9) ) OR (10 AND (NOT(2) AND NOT(3) AND NOT(4) AND NOT(5) AND NOT(6) AND NOT(7) AND NOT(8) AND NOT(9) ) )
rules.label: controllo range time

formulas.name: Time_to_Subtract
formulas.expression: IF(DATEVALUE({!$Record.blng__EndDateTime__c}) >= DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE({!$Record.blng__EndDateTime__c})),4,1) - CASE( MOD(DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE({!$Record.blng__EndDateTime__c})),4,1) - DATE(1900,1,7),7), 0,7, MOD(DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE({!$Record.blng__EndDateTime__c})),4,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) ) && DATEVALUE({!$Record.blng__EndDateTime__c}) < DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE({!$Record.blng__EndDateTime__c})),11,1) - CASE( MOD(DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE({!$Record.blng__EndDateTime__c})),11,1) - DATE(1900,1,7),7), 0,7, MOD(DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE({!$Record.blng__EndDateTime__c})),11,1) - DATE(1900,1,7),7) ), 2/24, 1/24 )
